text: @sedonalipstick @NYGovCuomo Contain the virus? That's impossible. You can contain the epidemic. That's something else entirely. How many have contracted the virus with no symptoms? What is herd immunity? What are actual mortality rates? What's the accuracy of testing now? Whats an immune system?
